DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare short-term effect two different thoracic spine thrust manipulation technique neck range-of-motion , pain , self-reported disability individual experience neck pain .
DOC.brief_title: A Comparison Two Thoracic Manipulation Techniques Improve Neck Pain
DOC.detailed_description: The study conduct Musculoskeletal clinical facility Dept . Physical Therapy Athletic Training , Northern Arizona University , Flagstaff AZ . The investigator aim test maximum 76 participant study . A phone screen determine initial eligibility . If participant meet inclusion criterion exclude phone screen , appointment schedule . Final eligibility determine initial session participant complete outcome measure evaluate licensed physical therapist . Participants involve study 4 week period . Each participant ask attend 4 session , one week session follow : Week 0 = baseline assessment treatment 1 ; Week 1= treatment 2 ; Week 2 = treatment 3 ; week 4 = follow-up assessment . After completion baseline assessment , qualify participant randomly assign either supine prone thoracic spine thrust manipulation intervention .
DOC.criteria: Between 20 50 year age ( inclusive ) Primary complaint neck pain without symptom spread one arm Overall rating neck pain intensity least 3/10 ; overall rating average participant 's rating current , least , bad pain experience previous 24 hour separate numeric pain rating scale 0 corresponds `` pain '' 10 corresponds `` bad possible pain '' Neck Disability Index ( NDI ) score > 10 point ( measure selfreported disability 0 50point scale high score indicate high level disability ) Proficient speak read English complete outcome questionnaire Neck pain related motor vehicle accident trauma within previous 6 week Neck pain spread arm Low back pain thoracic origin pain Nerve root involvement ; define presence two neurological finding ( e.g. , decreased strength , diminish deep tendon reflex , decrease sensation ) nerve root level Diagnosis cervical spinal stenosis ( narrowing central canal contains spinal cord ) History spinal tumor , spinal infection , cervical spine fracture , previous neck surgery Pending legal action relate current episode neck pain Contraindications thoracic spine thrust manipulation 1. serious pathology condition ( tumor , fracture , metabolic disease , rheumatoid arthritis , osteoporosis , history prolong steroid use ) 2. hyperreflexia 3. unsteadiness gait 4. nystagmus 5. loss visual acuity 6. impaired sensation face 7. alter taste 8. presence pathological reflex 9. pregnancy consider pregnancy
